ygData.subject: Re: glut of messages
ygData.msgSnippet: The whole point of a list is that everyone benefit from the answers. The best solution is defenitelly a Newsgroup. Qenelin ...
ygData.messageBody:
The whole point of a list is that everyone benefit from the answers.

The best solution is defenitelly a Newsgroup.

Qenelin

Mark S wrote:

> From: "Mark S" <malkin_fennin_ro@...>
>
> Perhaps one way to cut down on the excessive number of messages would
> be to e-mail answers to questions directly to the the person instead
> of replying to the eq_wizards list.� This will leave the board more
> open to discussion topics such as, benifits of O'keils Radation, best
> tatics for soloing or grouping, etc.
>
> Just my 2 coppers
>
> Malkin of Fennin Ro
